block_11.title: A new kindergarten for 280 places has been opened in Atyrau
block_11.text: A new kindergarten for 280 places has been built within the framework of Tengizchevroil LLP (TCO) “Egilik”voluntary social infrastructure program in Rakusha village near Atyrau.

block_11.title: Tengizchevroil Announces 2021 Results
block_11.text: In 2021, TCO remained the largest contributor to the national economy, with over $9 billion in direct payments to the Republic of Kazakhstan

block_11.title: Ministry of Ecology: I believe that perfection knows no limits
block_11.text: Minister of Ecology, Geology and Natural Resources of the Republic of Kazakhstan, Serikkali Brekeshev, visited the Tengiz field and got acquainted with Tengizchevroil’s (TCO) environmental protection measures.

block_11.title: A 3,000-seat central stadium was opened in Kulsary
block_11.text: A new central stadium for 3,000 seats was opened in honor of celebration of Kulsary city day, constructed by TCO within “Egilik” voluntary social and infrastructure program.

block_4.title: Kazakhstani content
block_4.subtitle: At TCO we search, identify and develop local suppliers for world-class projects like Tengiz
block_4.text: TCO operates one of the largest and technologically challenging oilfields in the world. Safety and reliability of exploration and production operations in Tengiz are the key to success in fueling Kazakhstani’s economic progress and fulfilling global energy demand.
